ticker: Join us over the festive period for live DJs mixing every Saturday night!
Best wishes from all our station staff, mods and DJs to all our subwoofers!
Out with the old and in with the new... DJs! Tonight we have all newer players!
Join us on December 30th, New Year's Eve and New Year's Day at Omega XXV Marathon! An Interlopr, Bass Station, Transient and Hex Furry Fest cross-over event! Raising money for the Trevor Project.

performers.name: Pibb
ticker: Please welcome our first new to the Station DJ!
Calling at Hard Techno, Raw, Bass House and Big House.
Follow Pibb at linktr.ee/DrPepperFerret

performers.name: Juicy Sushi
ticker: Please welcome our second new Station DJ tonight!
Calling at Trance and Hard Trance!
Follow Juicy Sushi on Bluesky @yuudokukawa.bsky.social

performers.name: Senky
ticker: Returning for their second trip from the Station, this DJ is calling at Techno and Bass House.
Follow Senky at youtube.com/@SenkyDragon

performers.name: Funnel Vision
ticker: Seen here before for Club Fallback, please welcome this DJ for their first Bass Station night proper!
Our final train tonight, and of the year! Calling at Trance and Psytrance.
'One year of grooving down, many more to go!'
Follow Funnel Vision on Bluesky @funnelvisionvrc.bsky.social and mixcloud.com/FunnelVissionVRC

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. We wish you all a Happy New Year!
See you all at the Omega XXV Marathon event!
Our final Bass Station night of the year! So long 2024!
All passengers are reminded to feed the hungry ampwaves any spare transistors you might have on your person. Those big teeth sure do go cronch-cronch.
Check out the poster for our New Year's Eve crossover event! Running Dec 30th to Jan 1st!
